<?xml version="1.0"?>


<!DOCTYPE rdf:RDF [
    <!ENTITY biro "http://purl.org/spar/biro/" >
    <!ENTITY owl "http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" >
    <!ENTITY about "http://www.essepuntato.it/about/" >
    <!ENTITY frbr "http://purl.org/vocab/frbr/core#" >
    <!ENTITY dc "http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" >
    <!ENTITY xsd "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#" >
    <!ENTITY rdfs "http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" >
    <!ENTITY rdf "http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" >
    <!ENTITY collections "http://swan.mindinformatics.org/ontologies/1.2/collections/" >
]>


<rdf:RDF xmlns="http://purl.org/spar/biro#"
     xml:base="http://purl.org/spar/biro"
     xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"
     xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#"
     xmlns:frbr="http://purl.org/vocab/frbr/core#"
     xmlns:about="http://www.essepuntato.it/about/"
     xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#"
     xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#"
     xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"
     xmlns:biro="http://purl.org/spar/biro/"
     xmlns:collections="http://swan.mindinformatics.org/ontologies/1.2/collections/">
    <owl:Ontology rdf:about="http://purl.org/spar/biro">
        <owl:versionInfo rdf:datatype="&xsd;string">1.0</owl:versionInfo>
        <dc:date rdf:datatype="&xsd;date">2011-02-24</dc:date>
        <dc:creator rdf:datatype="&xsd;string">David Shotton</dc:creator>
        <dc:creator rdf:datatype="&xsd;string">Silvio Peroni</dc:creator>
        <dc:title xml:lang="en">BiRO, the Bibliographic Reference Ontology</dc:title>
        <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">BiRO, the Bibliographic Reference Ontology is an ontology for describing bibliographic records and references, and their compilation into bibliographic collections and reference lists. It forms part of SPAR, a suite of Semantic Publishing and Referencing Ontologies.</rdfs:comment>
        <dc:description xml:lang="en">BiRO, the Bibliographic Reference Ontology, is an ontology structured according to the FRBR model to define bibliographic records (as subclasses of frbr:Work) and bibliographic references (as subclasses of frbr:Expression), and their compilations into bibliographic collections such as library catalogues, and into bibliographic lists such as reference lists in journal articles, respectively.

It provides a logical system for relating an individual bibliographic reference, such as appears in the reference list of a published article (which may lack the title of the cited article, the full names of the listed authors, or indeed the full list of authors):
â€¢  to the full bibliographic record for that cited article, which in addition to missing reference fields may also include the name of the publisher, and the ISSN or ISBN of the publication;
â€¢  to collections of bibliographic records such as library catatlogues; and
â€¢  to bibliographic lists, such as reference lists.</dc:description>
        <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">This ontology is available at http://purl.org/spar/biro, and uses the namespace prefix biro.</rdfs:comment>
        <dc:rights xml:lang="en">This work is distributed under a Creative Commons Attribution License (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/).</dc:rights>
        <owl:imports rdf:resource="http://purl.org/spar/frbr"/>
        <owl:imports rdf:resource="http://swan.mindinformatics.org/ontologies/1.2/collections.owl"/>
    </owl:Ontology>
    


    <!-- 
    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    //
    // Annotation properties
    //
    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
     -->

    <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="&owl;versionInfo"/>
    <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="&dc;creator"/>
    <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="&dc;date"/>
    <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="&rdfs;label"/>
    <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="&dc;description"/>
    <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="&rdfs;comment"/>
    <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="&dc;title"/>
    <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="&dc;rights"/>
    


    <!-- 
    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    //
    // Object Properties
    //
    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
     -->

    


    <!-- http://purl.org/spar/biro/isElementOf -->

    <owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&biro;isElementOf">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">is element of</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The link between an entity and the collection containing it.</rdfs:comment>
        <rdfs:range rdf:resource="&collections;Collection"/>
        <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="&collections;element"/>
        <rdfs:subPropertyOf rdf:resource="&owl;topObjectProperty"/>
    </owl:ObjectProperty>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/spar/biro/isReferencedBy -->

    <owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&biro;isReferencedBy">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">is referenced by</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The relation between a publication and the bibliographic record or bibliographic reference describing it.</rdfs:comment>
        <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="&frbr;Endeavour"/>
        <rdfs:subPropertyOf rdf:resource="&owl;topObjectProperty"/>
        <rdfs:range>
            <owl:Class>
                <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
                    <rdf:Description rdf:about="&biro;BibliographicRecord"/>
                    <rdf:Description rdf:about="&biro;BibliographicReference"/>
                </owl:unionOf>
            </owl:Class>
        </rdfs:range>
    </owl:ObjectProperty>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/spar/biro/references -->

    <owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&biro;references">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">references</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The relation between a bibliographic record or a bibliographic reference and the publication being referenced.</rdfs:comment>
        <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="&biro;isReferencedBy"/>
        <rdfs:range rdf:resource="&frbr;Endeavour"/>
        <rdfs:subPropertyOf rdf:resource="&owl;topObjectProperty"/>
        <rdfs:domain>
            <owl:Class>
                <owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
                    <rdf:Description rdf:about="&biro;BibliographicRecord"/>
                    <rdf:Description rdf:about="&biro;BibliographicReference"/>
                </owl:unionOf>
            </owl:Class>
        </rdfs:domain>
    </owl:ObjectProperty>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/vocab/frbr/core#part -->

    <owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&frbr;part"/>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/vocab/frbr/core#realization -->

    <owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&frbr;realization"/>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/vocab/frbr/core#realizationOf -->

    <owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&frbr;realizationOf"/>
    


    <!-- http://swan.mindinformatics.org/ontologies/1.2/collections/element -->

    <owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&collections;element"/>
    


    <!-- http://swan.mindinformatics.org/ontologies/1.2/collections/followedBy -->

    <owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&collections;followedBy"/>
    


    <!-- http://swan.mindinformatics.org/ontologies/1.2/collections/item -->

    <owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&collections;item"/>
    


    <!-- http://swan.mindinformatics.org/ontologies/1.2/collections/itemContent -->

    <owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&collections;itemContent"/>
    


    <!-- http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#topObjectProperty -->

    <owl:ObjectProperty rdf:about="&owl;topObjectProperty"/>
    


    <!-- 
    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
    //
    // Classes
    //
    ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
     -->

    


    <!-- http://purl.org/spar/biro/BibliographicCollection -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&biro;BibliographicCollection">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">bibliographic collection</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&frbr;Work"/>
        <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&collections;Set"/>
        <rdfs:subClassOf>
            <owl:Restriction>
                <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&collections;element"/>
                <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicRecord"/>
            </owl:Restriction>
        </rdfs:subClassOf>
        <rdfs:subClassOf>
            <owl:Restriction>
                <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&frbr;realization"/>
                <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicList"/>
            </owl:Restriction>
        </rdfs:subClassOf>
        <rdfs:subClassOf>
            <owl:Restriction>
                <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&frbr;part"/>
                <owl:allValuesFrom>
                    <owl:Class>
                        <owl:complementOf rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicCollection"/>
                    </owl:Class>
                </owl:allValuesFrom>
            </owl:Restriction>
        </rdfs:subClassOf>
        <dc:description xml:lang="en">A bibliographic collection is composed only of items containing bibliographic records.  Moreover, it cannot be part of other bibliographic collections, and it is realized only by bibliographic lists. </dc:description>
        <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A collection of bibliographic records, each of which references a publication (or a work in preparation for publication). Examples of bibliographic collections include a collection of the bibliographic records of all the publications that a single individual has authored, or a collection of those bibliographic records to be included in a research paper, where they are expressed as a reference list.</rdfs:comment>
    </owl:Class>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/spar/biro/BibliographicList -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&biro;BibliographicList">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">bibliographic list</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&frbr;Expression"/>
        <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&collections;List"/>
        <rdfs:subClassOf>
            <owl:Restriction>
                <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&collections;item"/>
                <owl:allValuesFrom>
                    <owl:Restriction>
                        <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&collections;itemContent"/>
                        <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicReference"/>
                    </owl:Restriction>
                </owl:allValuesFrom>
            </owl:Restriction>
        </rdfs:subClassOf>
        <rdfs:subClassOf>
            <owl:Restriction>
                <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&frbr;realizationOf"/>
                <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicCollection"/>
            </owl:Restriction>
        </rdfs:subClassOf>
        <dc:description xml:lang="en">A bibliographic list is composed only of items containing bibliographic references.  Moreover, it is always a realization of a bibliographic collection.</dc:description>
        <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An ordered list of bibliographic items, each of which contains a bibliographic reference.</rdfs:comment>
    </owl:Class>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/spar/biro/BibliographicRecord -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&biro;BibliographicRecord">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">bibliographic record</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&frbr;Work"/>
        <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&collections;Set"/>
        <rdfs:subClassOf>
            <owl:Restriction>
                <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&frbr;realization"/>
                <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicReference"/>
            </owl:Restriction>
        </rdfs:subClassOf>
        <dc:description xml:lang="en">A bibliographic record is realized only through bibliographic references.</dc:description>
        <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A record that uniquely references a particular publication (or a work in preparation for publication). Each bibliographic record is a set of entities describing aspects of the referenced work, for example authors, title, journal, publication year, DOI, ISSN, publisher and copyright information. The FRBR expression of a bibliographic record is a bibliographic reference, which usually contains only a sub-set of these entities, ordered in a particular way that corresponds to the house style of the publication in which it occurs.</rdfs:comment>
    </owl:Class>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/spar/biro/BibliographicReference -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&biro;BibliographicReference">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">bibliographic reference</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&frbr;Expression"/>
        <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&collections;List"/>
        <rdfs:subClassOf>
            <owl:Restriction>
                <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&collections;item"/>
                <owl:allValuesFrom>
                    <owl:Restriction>
                        <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&collections;itemContent"/>
                        <owl:allValuesFrom>
                            <owl:Restriction>
                                <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&biro;isElementOf"/>
                                <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicRecord"/>
                            </owl:Restriction>
                        </owl:allValuesFrom>
                    </owl:Restriction>
                </owl:allValuesFrom>
            </owl:Restriction>
        </rdfs:subClassOf>
        <rdfs:subClassOf>
            <owl:Restriction>
                <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&frbr;realizationOf"/>
                <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicRecord"/>
            </owl:Restriction>
        </rdfs:subClassOf>
        <dc:description xml:lang="en">A bibliographic reference is a realization of a bibliographic record. Moreover, it can contain only items referring to elements contained by the bibliographic record it realizes.</dc:description>
        <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An expression of a bibliographic record in a specific format, that references a particular publication (or a work in preparation for publication). Each bibliographic reference is a list of items containing entities that describe aspects of the referenced work - for example authors, title, journal, publication year - selected from the bibliographic record.</rdfs:comment>
    </owl:Class>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/spar/biro/LibraryCatalogue -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&biro;LibraryCatalogue">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">library catalogue</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicCollection"/>
        <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A catalogue of the bibliographic holdings of a library.</rdfs:comment>
    </owl:Class>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/spar/biro/ReferenceList -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&biro;ReferenceList">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">reference list</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicList"/>
        <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A list used to describe the bibliography of a research paper, a journal article, a book, a book chapter or similar publication.</rdfs:comment>
    </owl:Class>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/vocab/frbr/core#Endeavour -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&frbr;Endeavour"/>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/vocab/frbr/core#Expression -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&frbr;Expression"/>
    


    <!-- http://purl.org/vocab/frbr/core#Work -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&frbr;Work"/>
    


    <!-- http://swan.mindinformatics.org/ontologies/1.2/collections/Collection -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&collections;Collection"/>
    


    <!-- http://swan.mindinformatics.org/ontologies/1.2/collections/List -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&collections;List"/>
    


    <!-- http://swan.mindinformatics.org/ontologies/1.2/collections/ListItem -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&collections;ListItem"/>
    


    <!-- http://swan.mindinformatics.org/ontologies/1.2/collections/Set -->

    <owl:Class rdf:about="&collections;Set"/>
</rdf:RDF>

192         <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">bibliographic collection</rdfs:label>
193         <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&frbr;Work"/>
194         <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&collections;Set"/>
195         <rdfs:subClassOf>
196             <owl:Restriction>
197                 <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&collections;element"/>
198                 <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicRecord"/>
199             </owl:Restriction>
200         </rdfs:subClassOf>
201         <rdfs:subClassOf>
202             <owl:Restriction>
203                 <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&frbr;realization"/>
204                 <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicList"/>
205             </owl:Restriction>
206         </rdfs:subClassOf>
207         <rdfs:subClassOf>
208             <owl:Restriction>
209                 <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&frbr;part"/>
210                 <owl:allValuesFrom>
211                     <owl:Class>
212                         <owl:complementOf rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicCollection"/>
213                     </owl:Class>
214                 </owl:allValuesFrom>
215             </owl:Restriction>
216         </rdfs:subClassOf>
217         <dc:description xml:lang="en">A bibliographic collection is composed only of items containing bibliographic records.  Moreover, it cannot be part of other bibliographic collections, and it is realized only by bibliographic lists. </dc:description>
218         <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A collection of bibliographic records, each of which references a publication (or a work in preparation for publication). Examples of bibliographic collections include a collection of the bibliographic records of all the publications that a single individual has authored, or a collection of those bibliographic records to be included in a research paper, where they are expressed as a reference list.</rdfs:comment>
219     </owl:Class>
220     
221

224 
225     <owl:Class rdf:about="&biro;BibliographicList">
226         <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">bibliographic list</rdfs:label>
227         <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&frbr;Expression"/>
228         <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&collections;List"/>
229         <rdfs:subClassOf>
230             <owl:Restriction>
231                 <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&collections;item"/>
232                 <owl:allValuesFrom>
233                     <owl:Restriction>
234                         <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&collections;itemContent"/>
235                         <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicReference"/>
236                     </owl:Restriction>
237                 </owl:allValuesFrom>
238             </owl:Restriction>
239         </rdfs:subClassOf>
240         <rdfs:subClassOf>
241             <owl:Restriction>
242                 <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&frbr;realizationOf"/>
243                 <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicCollection"/>
244             </owl:Restriction>
245         </rdfs:subClassOf>
246         <dc:description xml:lang="en">A bibliographic list is composed only of items containing bibliographic references.  Moreover, it is always a realization of a bibliographic collection.</dc:description>
247         <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An ordered list of bibliographic items, each of which contains a bibliographic reference.</rdfs:comment>
248     </owl:Class>
249     
250 
251 
252     <!-- http://purl.org/spar/biro/BibliographicRecord -->
253 
254     <owl:Class rdf:about="&biro;BibliographicRecord">
255         <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">bibliographic record</rdfs:label>
256         <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&frbr;Work"/>
257         <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&collections;Set"/>
258         <rdfs:subClassOf>
259             <owl:Restriction>
260                 <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&frbr;realization"/>
261                 <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicReference"/>
262             </owl:Restriction>
263         </rdfs:subClassOf>
264         <dc:description xml:lang="en">A bibliographic record is realized only through bibliographic references.</dc:description>
265         <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A record that uniquely references a particular publication (or a work in preparation for publication). Each bibliographic record is a set of entities describing aspects of the referenced work, for example authors, title, journal, publication year, DOI, ISSN, publisher and copyright information. The FRBR expression of a bibliographic record is a bibliographic reference, which usually contains only a sub-set of these entities, ordered in a particular way that corresponds to the house style of the publication in which it occurs.</rdfs:comment>
266     </owl:Class>

271 
272     <owl:Class rdf:about="&biro;BibliographicReference">
273         <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">bibliographic reference</rdfs:label>
274         <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&frbr;Expression"/>
275         <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&collections;List"/>
276         <rdfs:subClassOf>
277             <owl:Restriction>
278                 <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&collections;item"/>
279                 <owl:allValuesFrom>
280                     <owl:Restriction>
281                         <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&collections;itemContent"/>
282                         <owl:allValuesFrom>
283                             <owl:Restriction>
284                                 <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&biro;isElementOf"/>
285                                 <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicRecord"/>
286                             </owl:Restriction>
287                         </owl:allValuesFrom>
288                     </owl:Restriction>
289                 </owl:allValuesFrom>
290             </owl:Restriction>
291         </rdfs:subClassOf>
292         <rdfs:subClassOf>
293             <owl:Restriction>
294                 <owl:onProperty rdf:resource="&frbr;realizationOf"/>
295                 <owl:allValuesFrom rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicRecord"/>
296             </owl:Restriction>
297         </rdfs:subClassOf>
298         <dc:description xml:lang="en">A bibliographic reference is a realization of a bibliographic record. Moreover, it can contain only items referring to elements contained by the bibliographic record it realizes.</dc:description>
299         <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">An expression of a bibliographic record in a specific format, that references a particular publication (or a work in preparation for publication). Each bibliographic reference is a list of items containing entities that describe aspects of the referenced work - for example authors, title, journal, publication year - selected from the bibliographic record.</rdfs:comment>
300     </owl:Class>

308         <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicCollection"/>
309         <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A catalogue of the bibliographic holdings of a library.</rdfs:comment>
310     </owl:Class>

318         <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="&biro;BibliographicList"/>
319         <rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">A list used to describe the bibliography of a research paper, a journal article, a book, a book chapter or similar publication.</rdfs:comment>
320     </owl:Class>
321

326     <owl:Class rdf:about="&frbr;Endeavour"/>

fields.text:
<!-- This is the FOAF formal vocabulary description, expressed using W3C RDFS and OWL markup. foaf/spec version -->
<!-- For more information about FOAF:                                            -->
<!--   see the FOAF project homepage, http://www.foaf-project.org/               -->
<!--   FOAF specification, http://xmlns.com/foaf/spec/                             -->
<!--                                                                             -->
<!-- first we introduce a number of RDF namespaces we will be using... -->
<rdf:RDF 
	xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" 
	xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" 
	xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" 
	xmlns:vs="http://www.w3.org/2003/06/sw-vocab-status/ns#" 
	xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" 
	xmlns:wot="http://xmlns.com/wot/0.1/" 
	xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">
<!-- Here we describe general characteristics of the FOAF vocabulary ('ontology'). -->
  <owl:Ontology rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" dc:title="Friend of a Friend (FOAF) vocabulary" dc:description="The Friend of a Friend (FOAF) RDF vocabulary, described using W3C RDF Schema and the Web Ontology Language." >
  </owl:Ontology>


  <!-- OWL/RDF interop section - geeks only -->
  <!--  most folk can ignore this lot. the game here is to make FOAF
  	work with vanilla RDF/RDFS tools, and with the stricter OWL DL 
	profile of OWL. At the moment we're in the OWL Full flavour of OWL. 
	The following are tricks to try have the spec live in both worlds
	at once. See
		http://phoebus.cs.man.ac.uk:9999/OWL/Validator
		http://www.mindswap.org/2003/pellet/demo.shtml
	...for some tools that help. 					-->
  <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wot/0.1/assurance"/>
  <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wot/0.1/src_assurance"/>
  <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2003/06/sw-vocab-status/ns#term_status"/>
  <!--  DC terms are NOT annotation properties in general, so we consider the following 
	claims scoped to this document. They may be removed in future revisions if
	OWL tools become more flexible. -->
  <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/description"/>
  <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/title"/>
  <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/date"/>
  <owl:Class rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Class"/>

<!--  <owl:Class rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Resource"/>
  <owl:Class rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal"/> -->
  <!-- end of OWL/RDF interop voodoo. mostly. -->

  <!-- utility class, a candidate for replacing the pattern of subproperty-ing rdfs:label -->
  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/LabelProperty" vs:term_status="unstable">
    <rdfs:label>Label Property</rdfs:label>
    <rdfs:comment>A foaf:LabelProperty is any RDF property with texual values that serve as labels.</rdfs:comment>
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdfs:Class>

<!-- FOAF classes (types) are listed first. -->

  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person" rdfs:label="Person" rdfs:comment="A person." vs:term_status="stable">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
<!--    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Person"/></rdfs:subClassOf> -->
    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/></rdfs:subClassOf>
<!--    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Agent"/></rdfs:subClassOf> -->
    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2000/10/swap/pim/contact#Person" rdfs:label="Person"/></rdfs:subClassOf>
    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#SpatialThing" rdfs:label="Spatial Thing"/></rdfs:subClassOf>
    <!-- aside: 
	are spatial things always spatially located? 
	Person includes imaginary people... discuss... -->
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>

<!--    <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/> this was a mistake; tattoo'd people, for example. -->

    <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
    <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Project"/>
  </rdfs:Class>
  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document" rdfs:label="Document" rdfs:comment="A document." vs:term_status="testing">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
<!--    <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Document"/> -->
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
    <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
    <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Project"/>
  </rdfs:Class>
  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization" rdfs:label="Organization" rdfs:comment="An organization." vs:term_status="stable">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
<!--    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Organization"/></rdfs:subClassOf> -->
    <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
    <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/>
    <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/>
  </rdfs:Class>
  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Group" vs:term_status="stable" rdfs:label="Group" rdfs:comment="A class of Agents.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
    <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
  </rdfs:Class>
  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent" vs:term_status="stable" rdfs:label="Agent" rdfs:comment="An agent (eg. person, group, software or physical artifact).">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
    <owl:equivalentClass rdf:resource="http://purl.org/dc/terms/Agent"/>
<!--    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Agent-3"/></rdfs:subClassOf> -->
  </rdfs:Class>
  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Project" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="Project" rdfs:comment="A project (a collective endeavour of some kind).">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
<!--    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Project"/></rdfs:subClassOf> -->
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
    <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/>
    <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/>
<!-- arguably a subclass of Agent; to be discussed -->
  </rdfs:Class>
  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Image" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="Image" rdfs:comment="An image.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
<!--    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Document"/></rdfs:subClassOf> -->
    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/></rdfs:subClassOf>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdfs:Class>

  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/PersonalProfileDocument" rdfs:label="PersonalProfileDocument" rdfs:comment="A personal profile RDF document." vs:term_status="testing">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
    <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/>
  </rdfs:Class>
	
  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineAccount" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="Online Account" rdfs:comment="An online account.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
    <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing" rdfs:label="Thing"/>
  </rdfs:Class>
  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineGamingAccount" vs:term_status="unstable" rdfs:label="Online Gaming Account" rdfs:comment="An online gaming account.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
    <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineAccount"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdfs:Class>
  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineEcommerceAccount" vs:term_status="unstable" rdfs:label="Online E-commerce Account" rdfs:comment="An online e-commerce account.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
    <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineAccount"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdfs:Class>
  <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineChatAccount" vs:term_status="unstable" rdfs:label="Online Chat Account" rdfs:comment="An online chat account.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
    <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineAccount"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdfs:Class>
<!-- FOAF properties (ie. relationships). -->
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/mbox" vs:term_status="stable" rdfs:label="personal mailbox" rdfs:comment="A 
personal mailbox, ie. an Internet mailbox associated with exactly one owner, the first owner of this mailbox. This is a 'static inverse functional property', in that  there is (across time and change) at most one individual that ever has any particular value for foaf:mbox.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#InverseFunctionalProperty"/>
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/mbox_sha1sum" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="sha1sum of a personal mailbox URI name" rdfs:comment="The sha1sum of the URI of an Internet mailbox associated with exactly one owner, the  first owner of the mailbox.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#InverseFunctionalProperty"/>

<!--
put it back in again 2006-01-29 - see 
http://chatlogs.planetrdf.com/swig/2006-01-29.html#T21-12-35
I have mailed rdfweb-dev@vapours.rdfweb.org for discussion.
Libby

Commenting out as a kindness to OWL DL users. The semantics didn't quite cover
our usage anyway, since (a) we want static-across-time, which is so beyond OWL as 
to be from another planet (b) we want identity reasoning invariant across xml:lang 
tagging. FOAF code will know what to do. OWL folks note, this assertion might return. 

danbri
-->
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#DatatypeProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>

  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/gender" vs:term_status="testing" 
rdfs:label="gender" 
rdfs:comment="The gender of this Agent (typically but not necessarily 'male' or 'female').">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/>
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#DatatypeProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
    <!-- whatever one's gender is, and we are liberal in leaving room for more options 
    than 'male' and 'female', we model this so that an agent has only one gender. -->
  </rdf:Property>



  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/geekcode" vs:term_status="archaic" rdfs:label="geekcode" rdfs:comment="A textual geekcode for this person, see http://www.geekcode.com/geek.html">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#DatatypeProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/dnaChecksum" vs:term_status="archaic" rdfs:label="DNA checksum" rdfs:comment="A checksum for the DNA of some thing. Joke.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#DatatypeProperty"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/sha1" vs:term_status="unstable" rdfs:label="sha1sum (hex)" rdfs:comment="A sha1sum hash, in hex.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#DatatypeProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/>
<!-- rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#InverseFunctionalProperty" -->
<!-- IFP under discussion -->
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/based_near" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="based near" rdfs:comment="A location that something is based near, for some broadly human notion of near.">
<!-- see http://esw.w3.org/topic/GeoOnion for extension  ideas -->
<!-- this was ranged as Agent... hmm -->
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#SpatialThing"/>

    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/pastProject" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="past project" rdfs:comment="A project this person has previously worked on.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/fundedBy" vs:term_status="archaic" rdfs:label="funded by" rdfs:comment="An organization funding a project or person.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/logo" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="logo" rdfs:comment="A logo representing some thing.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#InverseFunctionalProperty"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/topic" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="topic" rdfs:comment="A topic of some page or document.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/page"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/primaryTopic"
 vs:term_status="stable" rdfs:label="primary topic" rdfs:comment="The primary topic of some page or document.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/>
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/isPrimaryTopicOf"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>

  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/focus"  vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="focus" rdfs:comment="The underlying or 'focal' entity associated with some SKOS-described concept.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#Concept" rdfs:label="Concept"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>

  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/isPrimaryTopicOf"
 vs:term_status="stable" rdfs:label="is primary topic of" rdfs:comment="A document that this thing is the primary topic of.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#InverseFunctionalProperty"/>
    <rdfs:subPropertyOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/page"/>
    <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/primaryTopic"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>

  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/page" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="page" rdfs:comment="A page or document about this thing.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
    <owl:inverseOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/topic"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/theme" vs:term_status="archaic" rdfs:label="theme" rdfs:comment="A theme.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/account" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="account" rdfs:comment="Indicates an account held by this agent.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineAccount"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/holdsAccount" vs:term_status="archaic" rdfs:label="account" rdfs:comment="Indicates an account held by this agent.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineAccount"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/accountServiceHomepage" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="account service homepage" rdfs:comment="Indicates a homepage of the service provide for this online account.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineAccount"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/accountName" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="account name" rdfs:comment="Indicates the name (identifier) associated with this online account.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#DatatypeProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineAccount"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>
  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/member" vs:term_status="stable" rdfs:label="member" rdfs:comment="Indicates a member of a Group">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#ObjectProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Group"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>

  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/membershipClass" vs:term_status="unstable" rdfs:label="membershipClass" rdfs:comment="Indicates the class of individuals that are a member of a Group">
    <!-- maybe we should just use SPARQL or Rules, instead of trying to use OWL here -->
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#AnnotationProperty"/>
    <!-- Added to keep OWL DL from bluescreening. DON'T CROSS THE STREAMERS, etc. -->
    <!-- This may get dropped if it means non-DL tools don't expose it as a real property.
	 Should be fine though; I think only OWL stuff cares about AnnotationProperty.
	 Dan									 -->

<!--    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Group"/> prose only for now...-->
<!--    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Class"/> -->
<!--    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/> -->

    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>


  <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/birthday" vs:term_status="unstable" rdfs:label="birthday" rdfs:comment="The birthday of this Agent, represented in mm-dd string form, eg. '12-31'.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/>
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#DatatypeProperty"/>
    <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
    <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal"/>
    <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
  </rdf:Property>

   <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/age" vs:term_status="unstable" rdfs:label="age" rdfs:comment="The age in years of some agent.">
    <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#FunctionalProperty"/>
     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#DatatypeProperty"/>
     <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
     <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal"/>
     <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
   </rdf:Property>

   <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/status" vs:term_status="unstable" rdfs:label="status" rdfs:comment="A string expressing what the user is happy for the general public (normally) to know about their current activity.">
     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#DatatypeProperty"/>
     <rdfs:domain rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
     <rdfs:range rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal"/>
     <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
   </rdf:Property>

</rdf:RDF>
fields.description: The Friend of a Friend (FOAF) RDF vocabulary, described using W3C RDF Schema and the Web Ontology Language.
fields.html_auto_doc:
1 <!-- This is the FOAF formal vocabulary description, expressed using W3C RDFS and OWL markup. foaf/spec version -->
  2 <!-- For more information about FOAF:                                            -->
  3 <!--   see the FOAF project homepage, http://www.foaf-project.org/               -->
  4 <!--   FOAF specification, http://xmlns.com/foaf/spec/                             -->
  5 <!--                                                                             -->
  6 <!-- first we introduce a number of RDF namespaces we will be using... -->
  7 <rdf:RDF 
  8 	xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" 
  9 	xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" 
 10 	xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" 
 11 	xmlns:vs="http://www.w3.org/2003/06/sw-vocab-status/ns#" 
 12 	xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" 
 13 	xmlns:wot="http://xmlns.com/wot/0.1/" 
 14 	xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/">
 15 <!-- Here we describe general characteristics of the FOAF vocabulary ('ontology'). -->
 16   <owl:Ontology rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" dc:title="Friend of a Friend (FOAF) vocabulary" dc:description="The Friend of a Friend (FOAF) RDF vocabulary, described using W3C RDF Schema and the Web Ontology Language." >
 17   </owl:Ontology>
 18 
 19 
 20   <!-- OWL/RDF interop section - geeks only -->
 21   <!--  most folk can ignore this lot. the game here is to make FOAF
 22   	work with vanilla RDF/RDFS tools, and with the stricter OWL DL 
 23 	profile of OWL. At the moment we're in the OWL Full flavour of OWL. 
 24 	The following are tricks to try have the spec live in both worlds
 25 	at once. See
 26 		http://phoebus.cs.man.ac.uk:9999/OWL/Validator
 27 		http://www.mindswap.org/2003/pellet/demo.shtml
 28 	...for some tools that help. 					-->
 29   <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wot/0.1/assurance"/>
 30   <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wot/0.1/src_assurance"/>
 31   <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2003/06/sw-vocab-status/ns#term_status"/>
 32   <!--  DC terms are NOT annotation properties in general, so we consider the following 
 33 	claims scoped to this document. They may be removed in future revisions if
 34 	OWL tools become more flexible. -->
 35   <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/description"/>
 36   <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/title"/>
 37   <owl:AnnotationProperty rdf:about="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/date"/>
 38   <owl:Class rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Class"/>
 39 
 40 <!--  <owl:Class rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Resource"/>
 41   <owl:Class rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#Literal"/> -->
 42   <!-- end of OWL/RDF interop voodoo. mostly. -->
 43 
 44   <!-- utility class, a candidate for replacing the pattern of subproperty-ing rdfs:label -->
 45   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/LabelProperty" vs:term_status="unstable">
 46     <rdfs:label>Label Property</rdfs:label>
 47     <rdfs:comment>A foaf:LabelProperty is any RDF property with texual values that serve as labels.</rdfs:comment>
 48     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
 49     <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
 50   </rdfs:Class>
 51 
 52 <!-- FOAF classes (types) are listed first. -->
 53 
 54   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person" rdfs:label="Person" rdfs:comment="A person." vs:term_status="stable">
 55     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
 56 <!--    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Person"/></rdfs:subClassOf> -->
 57     <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/></rdfs:subClassOf>
 58 <!--    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Agent"/></rdfs:subClassOf> -->
 59     <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2000/10/swap/pim/contact#Person" rdfs:label="Person"/></rdfs:subClassOf>
 60     <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://www.w3.org/2003/01/geo/wgs84_pos#SpatialThing" rdfs:label="Spatial Thing"/></rdfs:subClassOf>
 61     <!-- aside: 
 62 	are spatial things always spatially located? 
 63 	Person includes imaginary people... discuss... -->
 64     <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
 65 
 66 <!--    <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/> this was a mistake; tattoo'd people, for example. -->
 67 
 68     <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
 69     <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Project"/>
 70   </rdfs:Class>
 71   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document" rdfs:label="Document" rdfs:comment="A document." vs:term_status="testing">
 72     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
 73 <!--    <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Document"/> -->
 74     <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
 75     <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
 76     <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Project"/>
 77   </rdfs:Class>
 78   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization" rdfs:label="Organization" rdfs:comment="An organization." vs:term_status="stable">
 79     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
 80 <!--    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Organization"/></rdfs:subClassOf> -->
 81     <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
 82     <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
 83     <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/>
 84     <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/>
 85   </rdfs:Class>
 86   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Group" vs:term_status="stable" rdfs:label="Group" rdfs:comment="A class of Agents.">
 87     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
 88     <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
 89   </rdfs:Class>
 90   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent" vs:term_status="stable" rdfs:label="Agent" rdfs:comment="An agent (eg. person, group, software or physical artifact).">
 91     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
 92     <owl:equivalentClass rdf:resource="http://purl.org/dc/terms/Agent"/>
 93 <!--    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Agent-3"/></rdfs:subClassOf> -->
 94   </rdfs:Class>
 95   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Project" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="Project" rdfs:comment="A project (a collective endeavour of some kind).">
 96     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
 97 <!--    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Project"/></rdfs:subClassOf> -->
 98     <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
 99     <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Person"/>
100     <owl:disjointWith rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/>
101 <!-- arguably a subclass of Agent; to be discussed -->
102   </rdfs:Class>
103   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Image" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="Image" rdfs:comment="An image.">
104     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
105 <!--    <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/wordnet/1.6/Document"/></rdfs:subClassOf> -->
106     <rdfs:subClassOf><owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/></rdfs:subClassOf>
107     <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
108   </rdfs:Class>
109 
110   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/PersonalProfileDocument" rdfs:label="PersonalProfileDocument" rdfs:comment="A personal profile RDF document." vs:term_status="testing">
111     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
112     <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Document"/>
113   </rdfs:Class>
114 	
115   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineAccount" vs:term_status="testing" rdfs:label="Online Account" rdfs:comment="An online account.">
116     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
117     <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
118     <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Thing" rdfs:label="Thing"/>
119   </rdfs:Class>
120   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineGamingAccount" vs:term_status="unstable" rdfs:label="Online Gaming Account" rdfs:comment="An online gaming account.">
121     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
122     <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineAccount"/>
123     <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
124   </rdfs:Class>
125   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineEcommerceAccount" vs:term_status="unstable" rdfs:label="Online E-commerce Account" rdfs:comment="An online e-commerce account.">
126     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
127     <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineAccount"/>
128     <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
129   </rdfs:Class>
130   <rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineChatAccount" vs:term_status="unstable" rdfs:label="Online Chat Account" rdfs:comment="An online chat account.">
131     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#Class"/>
132     <rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/OnlineAccount"/>
133     <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/"/>
134   </rdfs:Class>
135 <!-- FOAF properties (ie. relationships). -->
136   <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/mbox" vs:term_status="stable" rdfs:label="personal mailbox" rdfs:comment="A 
137 personal mailbox, ie. an Internet mailbox associated with exactly one owner, the first owner of this mailbox. This is a 'static inverse functional property', in that  there is (across time and change) at most one individual that ever has any particular value for foaf:mbox.">
138     <rdf:type rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#InverseFunctionalProperty"/>

fields.text:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<rdf:RDF xmlns:aiiso="http://purl.org/vocab/aiiso/schema#" xmlns:ore="http://www.openarchives.org/ore/terms/" xmlns:skos="http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#" xmlns:cc="http://web.resource.org/cc/" xmlns:dctype="http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" xmlns:vann="http://purl.org/vocab/vann/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#" xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:vs="http://www.w3.org/2003/06/sw-vocab-status/ns#"
>
	<owl:Ontology rdf:about="" dc:date="2008-10-06">
		<dc:title xml:lang="en">Academic Research Project Funding Ontology (ARPFO)</dc:title>
		<rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The Academic Research Project Funding Ontology (ARPFO) provides classes and properties to describe the project funding structure of academic research, and also provides classes and properties to encode the relationships between project bids, projects, research groups and the resultant outputs.</rdfs:comment>
		<dc:identifier>http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding/schema</dc:identifier>
		<dct:isVersionOf rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
		<dc:creator>Ben O'Steen</dc:creator>
		<dc:rights>Copyright 2008 Oxford University</dc:rights>
		<vann:preferredNamespaceUri>http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#</vann:preferredNamespaceUri>
		<vann:preferredNamespacePrefix>projectfunding</vann:preferredNamespacePrefix>
		<dct:replaces rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding-0.1#"/>
		<dct:hasFormat>
			<dctype:Text rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding/projectfunding.html">
				<dc:format>
					<dct:IMT>
						<rdf:value>text/html</rdf:value>
						<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">HTML</rdfs:label>
					</dct:IMT>
				</dc:format>
			</dctype:Text>
		</dct:hasFormat>
		<dct:hasFormat>
			<dctype:Text rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding/projectfunding.rdf">
				<dc:format>
					<dct:IMT>
						<rdf:value>application/rdf+xml</rdf:value>
						<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">RDF</rdfs:label>
					</dct:IMT>
				</dc:format>
			</dctype:Text>
		</dct:hasFormat>
		<dct:issued>2010-01-14</dct:issued>
		<skos:historyNote rdf:value="First cut of the ontology published" dc:date="2008-10-06" dc:creator="Ben O'Steen"/>
		<skos:historyNote rdf:value="Added: Principal Investigator, Co-investigator, Project/Research Purpose" dc:date="2008-10-06" dc:creator="Ben O'Steen"/>
	</owl:Ontology>
	<cc:Work rdf:about="">
		<cc:license rdf:resource="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/uk/"/>
	</cc:Work>
	<cc:License rdf:about="http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/uk/">
		<cc:permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Reproduction"/>
		<cc:permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Distribution"/>
		<cc:requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Notice"/>
		<cc:requires rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/Attribution"/>
		<cc:permits rdf:resource="http://web.resource.org/cc/DerivativeWorks"/>
	</cc:License>
	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project">
		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Project</rdfs:label>
		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">This class is used to represent the concepts and overall details concerning a research project. The intention is that this class concerns the abstract notion of the project being described, and that http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#ProjectSection represents the instance of the project for a given period of time. Contributors, work output and other such details should be attached to the right ProjectSection.</rdfs:comment>
		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
		<rdfs:subClassOf>http://umbel.org/umbel/sc/ResearchProject</rdfs:subClassOf>
	</rdfs:Class>
	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#ProjectSection">
		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Section of a Project</rdfs:label>
		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">This represents a temporal portion of the project to which is it part of (Use of <#ProjectSection> <dcterms:isPartOf> <#Project> is highly recommended.) Note that ProjectSection durations are anticipated to be able to overlap, to represent parallel project streams and for it not to be restricted to sequencial project sections. The term 'Work package' is closely related to this class.</rdfs:comment>
		<rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project"/>
		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
	</rdfs:Class>
	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#FundingBody">
		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Funding Body</rdfs:label>
		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">A Funding Body is an organisational unit that represents the legal entity which is funding a given project/person/group.</rdfs:comment>
		<rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
	</rdfs:Class>
	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Bid">
		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">A Funding Bid</rdfs:label>
		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">A Funding Bid represents the process of bidding for resources from one or more Funding Bodies. In this respect, it is a form of Project. It is anticipated that use of a rdf schema such as ore:Aggregation will be used to connect the electronic representations of the paper documentation to the Bid.</rdfs:comment>
		<rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project"/>
		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
	</rdfs:Class>
	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding">
		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Funding</rdfs:label>
		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">Funding is the main class representing the types of funding applicable to research projects, but not limited to just research projects. It is expected that any form of Funding will be subclassed from this one.</rdfs:comment>
		<rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://umbel.org/umbel/sc/EconomicAgreement"/>
		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
	</rdfs:Class>
	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Grant">
		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Grant</rdfs:label>
		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">A Grant represents a fund given to organizations by foundations, corporations, governments, small business and individuals. Most grants are made to fund a specific project and require some level of reporting.</rdfs:comment>
		<rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding"/>
		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
	</rdfs:Class>
	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Investment">
		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Investment</rdfs:label>
		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">An Investment represents a fund given to organizations by foundations, corporations, governments, small business and individuals. Most investments are made to fund a specific project and often are made for profit and intellectual property sharing agreements.</rdfs:comment>
		<rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding"/>
		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
	</rdfs:Class>
	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Donation">
		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Donation</rdfs:label>
		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">An Donation represents a fund given to organizations by foundations, corporations, governments, small business and individuals. Most donations are made to fund an organisation, or the aim of an organisation, rather than a specific project.</rdfs:comment>
		<rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding"/>
		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
	</rdfs:Class>
	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Endowment">
		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Endowment</rdfs:label>
		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">An Endowment represents a fund given to organizations by foundations, corporations, governments, small business and individuals. Most endowments are made to fund a specific project over a long period of time. Endowments are typically invested to provide a source of monetary interest for the funded organisation.</rdfs:comment>
		<rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding"/>
		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
	</rdfs:Class>
	<rdf:Property rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#provides">
		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">provides the money for</rdfs:label>
		<rdfs:domain>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Group"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#FundingBody"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://purl.org/vocab/participation/schema#Role"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:domain>
		<rdfs:range>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:range>
		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
	</rdf:Property>
    <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#funds">
		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">funds the activities of</rdfs:label>
		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string"> The '#funds' property is intended to have exactly the opposite range and domain to the '#provides' property. Chains of FundingBody to Funding to FundingBody to Funding and so on are anticipated, e.g. UK Government #provides #Funding which #funds JISC, and JISC itself #provides #Funding that #funds #Projects.</rdfs:comment>
		<rdfs:domain>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:domain>
		<rdfs:range>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Group"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#FundingBody"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://purl.org/vocab/participation/schema#Role"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:range>
		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
	</rdf:Property>
	<rdf:Property rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#hasDocumentation">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has documentation</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:comment>Connects a Bid, Project and so on to the formal documentation that describes the Bid or Project. May include the completed forms and written bid information. Intended to link either to an ore:Aggregation, or more simply, to a BNode with a dc:source linking to the URI of the documentation. Applied usage will determine which is preferable, and for now, the rdfs:range is left undefined.</rdfs:comment>
        <rdfs:domain>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#FundingBody"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:domain>
        <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
    </rdf:Property>
	<rdf:Property rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#contributesTo">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">contributes to</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:comment>Associates an participation:Role or foaf:Agent with a given Project, Bid or ProjectSection.</rdfs:comment>
        <rdfs:domain>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://purl.org/vocab/participation/schema#Role"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:domain>
		<rdfs:range>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Group"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
					<!-- Explicitly noting the following -->
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#FundingBody"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:range>
        <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
    </rdf:Property>
	<rdf:Property rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#hasPrincipalInvestigator">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has Principal Investigator</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:comment>Associates a Project, Bid or ProjectSection with a Principal Investigator.</rdfs:comment>
		<rdfs:domain>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
					<!-- Explicitly noting the following -->
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#ProjectSection"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Bid"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:domain>
		<rdfs:range>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://purl.org/vocab/participation/schema#Role"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:range>
        <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
    </rdf:Property>
	<rdf:Property rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#hasCoInvestigator">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has Co-Investigator</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:comment>Associates a Project, Bid or ProjectSection with a Co-Investigator.</rdfs:comment>
		<rdfs:domain>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
					<!-- Explicitly noting the following -->
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#ProjectSection"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Bid"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:domain>
		<rdfs:range>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Agent"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://purl.org/vocab/participation/schema#Role"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:range>
        <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
    </rdf:Property>
    
    	<rdf:Property rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#grantNumber">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has grant number</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:comment>This predicate connects a Project, Bid or ProjectSection with the grant number.</rdfs:comment>
        <rdfs:domain>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#FundingBody"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:domain>
        <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
        <rdfs:subPropertyOf rdf:resource="http://purl.org/dc/terms/identifier"></rdfs:subPropertyOf>
    </rdf:Property>
    
    
	<rdf:Property rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#statedPurpose">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">has investigation purpose:</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:comment>This predicate connects a Project, Bid or ProjectSection with the (Literal) stated purpose.</rdfs:comment>
        <rdfs:domain>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#FundingBody"/>
					<owl:Class rdf:about="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:domain>
        <rdfs:range rdf:resource="rdfs:Literal"/>
        <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
        <rdfs:subPropertyOf rdf:resource="http://purl.org/dc/terms/description"></rdfs:subPropertyOf>
    </rdf:Property>
	<rdf:Property rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#startDate">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">startDate</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:comment>The date on which this event/process started.</rdfs:comment>
        <rdfs:domain>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#FundingBody"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:domain>
        <rdfs:range rdf:resource="xsd:Date"/>
        <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
        <owl:sameAs rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/12/cal/ical#dtstart"></owl:sameAs>
    </rdf:Property>
    <rdf:Property rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#endDate">
        <rdfs:label xml:lang="en">endDate</rdfs:label>
        <rdfs:comment>The date on which this event/process stopped</rdfs:comment>
        <rdfs:domain>
			<owl:Class>
				<owl:unionOf rdf:parseType="Collection">
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Funding"/>
				    <owl:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#FundingBody"/>
				</owl:unionOf>
			</owl:Class>
		</rdfs:domain>
        <rdfs:range rdf:resource="xsd:Date"/>
        <rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
        <owl:sameAs rdf:resource="http://www.w3.org/2002/12/cal/ical#dtend"></owl:sameAs>
    </rdf:Property>
</rdf:RDF>
fields.description: The Academic Research Project Funding Ontology (ARPFO) provides classes and properties to describe the project funding structure of academic research, and also provides classes and properties to encode the relationships between project bids, projects, research groups and the resultant outputs.
