  2 <rdf:RDF xmlns:aiiso="http://purl.org/vocab/aiiso/schema#" xmlns:ore="http://www.openarchives.org/ore/terms/" xmlns:skos="http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#" xmlns:cc="http://web.resource.org/cc/" xmlns:dctype="http://purl.org/dc/dcmitype/" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/" xmlns:vann="http://purl.org/vocab/vann/" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#" xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:vs="http://www.w3.org/2003/06/sw-vocab-status/ns#"
  3 >
  4 	<owl:Ontology rdf:about="" dc:date="2008-10-06">
  5 		<dc:title xml:lang="en">Academic Research Project Funding Ontology (ARPFO)</dc:title>
  6 		<rdfs:comment xml:lang="en">The Academic Research Project Funding Ontology (ARPFO) provides classes and properties to describe the project funding structure of academic research, and also provides classes and properties to encode the relationships between project bids, projects, research groups and the resultant outputs.</rdfs:comment>
  7 		<dc:identifier>http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding/schema</dc:identifier>
  8 		<dct:isVersionOf rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
  9 		<dc:creator>Ben O'Steen</dc:creator>
 10 		<dc:rights>Copyright 2008 Oxford University</dc:rights>
 11 		<vann:preferredNamespaceUri>http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#</vann:preferredNamespaceUri>

 35 		<skos:historyNote rdf:value="First cut of the ontology published" dc:date="2008-10-06" dc:creator="Ben O'Steen"/>
 36 		<skos:historyNote rdf:value="Added: Principal Investigator, Co-investigator, Project/Research Purpose" dc:date="2008-10-06" dc:creator="Ben O'Steen"/>

 48 	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project">
 49 		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Project</rdfs:label>
 50 		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">This class is used to represent the concepts and overall details concerning a research project. The intention is that this class concerns the abstract notion of the project being described, and that http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#ProjectSection represents the instance of the project for a given period of time. Contributors, work output and other such details should be attached to the right ProjectSection.</rdfs:comment>
 51 		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
 52 		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
 53 		<rdfs:subClassOf>http://umbel.org/umbel/sc/ResearchProject</rdfs:subClassOf>
 54 	</rdfs:Class>
 55 	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#ProjectSection">
 56 		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Section of a Project</rdfs:label>
 57 		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">This represents a temporal portion of the project to which is it part of (Use of <#ProjectSection> <dcterms:isPartOf> <#Project> is highly recommended.) Note that ProjectSection durations are anticipated to be able to overlap, to represent parallel project streams and for it not to be restricted to sequencial project sections. The term 'Work package' is closely related to this class.</rdfs:comment>
 58 		<rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Project"/>
 59 		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
 60 		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
 61 	</rdfs:Class>
 62 	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#FundingBody">
 63 		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">Funding Body</rdfs:label>
 64 		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">A Funding Body is an organisational unit that represents the legal entity which is funding a given project/person/group.</rdfs:comment>
 65 		<rdfs:subClassOf rdf:resource="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/Organization"/>
 66 		<rdfs:isDefinedBy rdf:resource="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#"/>
 67 		<dct:issued>2008-10-06</dct:issued>
 68 	</rdfs:Class>
 69 	<rdfs:Class rdf:about="http://vocab.ox.ac.uk/projectfunding#Bid">
 70 		<rdfs:label xml:lang="en">A Funding Bid</rdfs:label>
 71 		<rdfs:comment rdf:datatype="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">A Funding Bid represents the process of bidding for resources from one or more Funding Bodies. In this respect, it is a form of Project. It is anticipated that use of a rdf schema such as ore:Aggregation will be used to connect the electronic representations of the paper documentation to the Bid.</rdfs:comment>
